summary: Inventory management app with dashboard stats, stock tracking, and purchase/sales/returns management. Key fix: dashboard cards showing zeros and stock summary values incorrect.
architectural_notes: Stock formula: Stock = Purchases − Sales − Purchase Returns + Sales Returns (applies to Gross Weight, Net Weight, and Pieces)
known_issues: Dashboard cards displaying 0 for all stats (Current Stock, Sales, Purchases, Returns)
Stock page Summary tab showing incorrect values not matching the stock formula

existing_features.title: Fix the backend analytics query so that the Dashboard page fetches and displays real, non-zero values for Current Stock, Sales, Purchases, Purchase Returns, and Sales Returns. The dashboard must not show 0.000g / 0 pieces when actual transaction data exists.

Split the single 'Returns' dashboard card into two separate cards: 'Purchase Returns' and 'Sales Returns', each showing their own Total Weight and Total Pieces independently. The backend must supply separate aggregated totals for purchase returns and sales returns.

Apply the correct stock formula everywhere stock totals are computed — on the Dashboard Current Stock card AND on the Stock page Summary tab — for Gross Weight, Net Weight, and Pieces: Stock = Purchases − Sales − Purchase Returns + Sales Returns. The backend must compute or expose aggregates that allow this formula to be applied.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix dashboard cards showing all zeros - fetch real values for Current Stock, Sales, Purchases, Purchase Returns, Sales Returns
Split Returns dashboard card into separate Purchase Returns and Sales Returns cards
Fix Stock page Summary tab to use correct formula (Stock = Purchases - Sales - Purchase Returns + Sales Returns) for Gross Weight, Net Weight, and Pieces
